body:
ATTENTION EVERYONE IN AVICUS!!!!!!
This is my 2 anniversary on this server.  You avicus players make me feel soo welcome to avicore/avicus i love you all so so much and you make everything 100 times better Than any other servers even when i rage you still are nice to me ( I don't rage often tho ) 



                                                         Thank you all so so much :D :P
